item.description:

item.title: 奇货可居：了解习近平之父（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：了解习近平之父（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Understanding the Father of Xi Jinping (Podcast)】

item.title: MTN 在尼日利亚货币冲击引发亏损后恢复盈利
item.description: 非洲最大的移动网络运营商 MTN 集团有限公司表示，由于货币贬值在 2024 年打击了其尼日利亚业务的盈利，该公司上半年恢复了盈利。【原文：MTN Group Ltd. said it returned to profit in the first half after Africa’s largest mobile-network operator didn’t see a repeat of currency depreciation that hit 2024 earnings from its Nigerian operation.】

item.title: 外国投资者连续 17 周买入日本股票的狂潮终结
item.description: 日本交易所集团（Japan Exchange Group）的数据显示，外国投资者上周结束了对日本股票的狂热购买，而日本保险公司也趁市场反弹至创纪录水平之机，抛售了创纪录的最大量股票。【原文：Foreign investors’ buying spree in Japanese equities ended last week, data from Japan Exchange Group showed, while Japanese insurers also offloaded the largest amount on record as they took advantage of the market’s rally to record levels.】

item.title: 分析师称，特朗普征收 50%的关税可能使印度经济增长减少 1
item.description: 分析人士说，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对印度征收的额外关税将进一步损害这个南亚国家本已放缓的经济，使其国内生产总值缩水多达一个百分点。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s additional tariffs on India will further damage the South Asian nation’s already slowing economy and shrink its gross domestic product by as much as a percentage point, analysts said.】

item.title: 特朗普施加关税压力，莫迪誓言保护农民
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对印度商品加倍征收关税后的第二天，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪承诺维护农民的利益，新德里向美国出口商品开放市场的压力与日俱增。【原文：Prime Minister Narendra Modi pledged to safeguard the interests of farmers, a day after President Donald Trump doubled tariffs on Indian goods, with pressure mounting on New Delhi to open up its markets to US exports.】

item.title: 在大型人工智能活动之前，软银因押注英伟达而扭亏为盈
item.description: 软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp. ）在 6 月份实现了盈利，这得益于其持有的包括英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）和 Coupang Inc.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. swung to a profit in the June quarter, bolstered by gains in its holdings including Nvidia Corp. and Coupang Inc., in a boost for founder Masayoshi Son’s planned bets on artificial intelligence technologies.】

item.title: TPG 支持的 SK Finance 将在印度启动规模缩小的 IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，TPG 公司支持的印度融资公司 SK Finance Ltd. 在缩小交易规模后，最早可能于下周开始接受投资者的首次公开募股订单。【原文：SK Finance Ltd., the Indian financing company backed by TPG Inc., is likely to begin taking investor orders its initial public offering by as early as next week after reducing the size of the deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞典核心通胀率低于分析师预测，支持宽松政策
item.description: 瑞典上个月的核心通胀率降幅略高于分析师的预期，这可能会支持瑞典中央银行在 8 月晚些时候降息，以支持不景气的经济。【原文：Sweden’s core inflation rate fell slightly more than analysts expected last month, likely backing the case for the country’s central to cut interest rates later in August to support the misfiring economy.】

item.title: 德国工业在贸易动荡中创下近一年来最大跌幅
item.description: 德国工业生产出现了近一年来的最大降幅，这是欧洲最大经济体在与美国贸易条件受限的情况下遭遇的又一次挫折。【原文：German industrial production suffered its biggest drop in almost a year, another setback for Europe’s largest economy as it reels from curtailed trade conditions with the US.】

item.title: 受制裁的油轮被卖给印度废品收购站，显示了船队的黑暗之痛
item.description: 一艘受美国制裁的油轮在印度被拆解，其销售包括延长付款条件和保护船东身份的措施，这些不寻常的条款表明，随着制裁措施的收紧，老旧的黑暗船队船只面临着越来越大的压力。【原文：The sale of a US-sanctioned tanker being pulled apart in India includes extended payment terms and measures to shield the identity of the owner, unusual clauses that point to growing pressure on older dark fleet vessels as sanctions enforcement tightens.】

item.title: 阿达尼中标比哈尔邦 30 亿美元燃煤电厂项目
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）将投资 30 亿美元，在东部比哈尔邦建设并运营一座 2400 兆瓦的煤炭发电厂，他的港口能源企业集团将继续在国内市场拓展各项业务。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani will invest $3 billion to build and operate a 2,400 MW coal power generation plant in the eastern state of Bihar as his port-to-energy conglomerate continues to expand across businesses in the domestic market.】

item.title: 震撼韩国股市的税收计划将进入执政党辩论阶段
item.description: 韩国执政党将于周日与政府官员会面，就提高资本利得税的提议发表意见。【原文：South Korea’s ruling party will meet with government officials Sunday to present its view on a proposal to raise the capital gains tax, which rattled markets and sparked a wave of public backlash.】

item.title: 中国 Cobot 制造商华燕机器人据称将申请在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，广东华燕机器人股份有限公司已秘密申请在香港首次公开募股，募集资金可能超过 2 亿美元。【原文：Guangdong Huayan Robotics Co. has confidentially filed for a Hong Kong initial public offering that could raise more than $200 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 泰国大亨和中国开发商因大楼倒塌被起诉
item.description: 泰国检察官起诉了一名当地建筑业巨头、中国开发商和其他 20 多名当事人，他们都与曼谷一座部分完工的政府大楼倒塌事件有关，该事件导致 89 名工人在 3 月份的地震中丧生。【原文：Thai prosecutors indicted a local construction magnate, Chinese developer and more than 20 other parties linked to the collapse of a partly finished government building in Bangkok that killed 89 workers following an earthquake in March.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国央行会议前英国股市将落后于欧洲股市
为什么我们的经济学家— 是少数认为澳大利亚央行将维持震荡的人之一— 现在又认为会降息？
item.description:
本周的彭博澳大利亚播客：我们将与经济学家 James McIntyre 深入探讨本月澳大利亚央行利率决议的预期。【原文：

This week on the Bloomberg Australia Podcast: We take a deeper dive into what to expect from this month’s RBA rate decision, with our economist James McIntyre.

】

item.title: 澳新银行高管受命改革银行文化数月后退休
item.description: 澳新银行集团控股有限公司（ANZ Group Holdings Ltd.）高级执行官马克-埃文斯（Mark Evans）在接受改善公司文化和风险管理缺陷的任务数月后，已从银行业退休。【原文：ANZ Group Holdings Ltd. senior executive Mark Evans has retired from banking, several months after taking on the task to improve the firm’s culture and risk management shortcomings.】

item.title: 丰田下调年度业绩预期，准备应对 95 亿美元的关税冲击
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp. ）下调了其年度指导目标，该汽车制造商警告称，美国对进口汽车征收关税将对其营业收入造成 1.4 万亿日元（95 亿美元）的冲击。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp. lowered its annual guidance as the carmaker warned of a ¥1.4 trillion ($9.5 billion) hit to operating income from US tariffs on imported cars.】

item.title: 越南总理呼吁国家银行取消信贷增长目标
item.description: 越南政府周四表示，作为提振经济努力的一部分，越南总理下令央行制定一项试点计划，从明年开始取消信贷增长目标。【原文：Vietnam’s Prime Minister ordered the central bank to develop a pilot plan to remove credit growth targets starting next year, as part of efforts to boost the economy, the government said Thursday.】

item.title: 德国电信上调 2025 年展望，因美国和欧洲销售强劲
item.description: 德国电信公司（Deutsche Telekom AG）今年第二次上调了 2025 年的利润预期，此前美国和欧洲的强劲销售推动了第二季度盈利超出分析师预期。【原文：Deutsche Telekom AG raised its 2025 profit forecast for a second time this year after strong sales in the US and Europe fueled second quarter earnings that beat analyst estimates.】

item.title: 西门子因铁路产品需求强劲而收入攀升
item.description: 西门子公司第三财季的收入和订单均有所增长，原因是对这家德国工业制造商铁路产品的强劲需求抵消了软件业务的大幅下滑。【原文：Siemens AG’s revenue and orders rose in its fiscal third quarter after robust demand for the German industrial manufacturer’s rail products offset a sharp decline at the software business.】

item.title: 全球投资者出资 4.25 亿澳元支持澳大利亚初创企业
item.description: Airtree Ventures 是 Canva Inc. 和 AirWallex 的投资方，该公司已完成了一项 4.25 亿美元的基金，重点投资于澳大利亚和新西兰，并表示国际社会对该地区初创企业的兴趣日益浓厚。【原文：Airtree Ventures, an investor in Canva Inc. and AirWallex, has closed a $425 million fund focused on Australia and New Zealand, saying international interest is growing in the region’s startups.】

item.title: 中国贸易数据显示出口加速，金属上涨
item.description: 基本金属在伦敦走高，因为数据显示中国的整体出口活动出人意料地强劲，而这正是世界第二大经济体对工业商品需求的重要推动力。【原文：Base metals advanced in London as data pointed to surprising strength in China’s overall export activity — an important driver of demand for industrial commodities in the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 廉价股票和市场改革吸引投资者投资沙特
item.description: 尽管目前沙特股市表现不佳，交易量也在下降，但一连串的改革措施正在使外国人更容易在沙特投资，从而增强了投资者的信心，相信沙特股市终有一天会与全球竞争对手一较高下。【原文：A rush of reforms is making it easier for foreigners to invest in Saudi Arabia, boosting confidence among investors that the country’s stock market will one day compete with global rivals even as equities currently underperform and trading volumes decline.】

item.title: 中国寻求减少生猪饲养量以缓解供过于求的局面
item.description: 中国正在敦促养猪大户将种猪数量减少约 2%，这是中国为解决食品行业供过于求问题而采取的最新举措，供过于求引发了对通货紧缩的担忧。【原文：China is urging top pig farmers to scale back breeding herds by about 2%, the latest push to tackle oversupply in the country’s food sector, which has sparked concerns over deflation.】

item.title: 发达国家对瑞士征收美国最高关税
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的最高关税之一现已对瑞士生效，此前瑞士政府为争取美国总统降低税率所做的最后努力以失败告终。【原文：One of Donald Trump’s highest tariffs is now in effect on Switzerland after the government failed in its last-ditch effort to get the US president to lower the rate.】

item.title: 获胜股票总是统治市场，但从未像现在这样
item.description:
选股人该做什么？然而，狭隘的市场正是资本主义的一贯产物。【原文：

What’s a stock picker to do? Yet narrow markets are what capitalism always produces.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行的 2% 降准掩盖了欧元区通胀的巨大波幅
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的官员们在庆祝欧元区实现物价稳定的同时也要注意：2% 的通胀率只是相对而言。【原文：For European Central Bank officials marking the achievement of price stability within the euro zone, there’s a caveat: inflation at 2% is all a bit relative.】

item.title: 摩根大通、德国商业银行和荷兰国际集团支持欧洲国防银行
item.description: 摩根大通（JP Morgan Chase & Co）、德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）和荷兰国际集团（ING Group NV）已为一家新的全欧洲银行提供支持，该银行旨在促进整个地区的安全支出。【原文：JP Morgan Chase & Co, Commerzbank AG and ING Group NV have given their backing to a new Europe-wide bank designed to boost security spending across the region, according to the development group guiding its creation.】
